- [ AppKit ](/documentation/appkit)

-  open(_:options:configuration:) 

Instance Method# open(_:options:configuration:)

macOS 10.10–11.0Deprecated

```
func open(
    _ url: URL,
    options: NSWorkspace.LaunchOptions = [],
    configuration: [NSWorkspace.LaunchConfigurationKey : Any]
) throws -> NSRunningApplication
```

Deprecated

Use [`open(_:configuration:completionHandler:)`](/documentation/appkit/nsworkspace/open(_:configuration:completionhandler:)) instead.
